text.section: Notwithstanding any other provision of this section, the Cabinet for Health and Family Services may by regulation specifically prohibit any such codeine preparation from being sold over the counter due to actual or potential abuse.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 541, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 484, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(3). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 20.
